title-group.article-title: Correction: Correlated receptor transport processes buffer single-cell heterogeneity

related-article.article-title: Correlated receptor transport processes buffer single-cell heterogeneity

body.p: There is an update to the Funding statement. It should read: "This work was supported by the German Federal Ministry of Education and Research (BMBF, www.bmbf.de) via the MedSys-Network LungSys II (http://www.lungsys.de, FKZ 0316042C), SysTec-EpiSys (http://www.episys.org, FKZ 0315502D), the e:Bio RNA-CODE joint research project (FKZ 031A298), and an e:Bio junior group grant, the German Center for Lung Research (Deutsches Zentrum f체r Lungenforschung (DZL), www.dzl.de), the German Research Foundation (DFG, EXC81), and by the Networking Fund of the Helmholtz Association within the Helmholtz Alliance on Systems Biology/SBCancer (www.helmholtz.de). The authors further acknowledge financial support by the DFG within the funding programme Open Access Publishing, by the Baden-W체rttemberg Ministry of Science, Research and the Arts, and by Ruprecht-Karls-Universit채t Heidelberg. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript."

ref.mixed-citation: Kallenberger SM, Unger AL, Legewie S, Lymperopoulos K, Klingm체ller U, Eils R, et al. (2017) Correlated receptor transport processes buffer single-cell heterogeneity. PLoS Comput Biol 13(9): e1005779. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pcbi.1005779 28945754
